item.title: Vance tells Minneapolis to ‘stop fighting’ ICE as White House doubles down on crackdown
item.description: JD Vance visits Minnesota amid growing protests over Trump's immigration crackdown and controversial ICE raids that have sparked intense national deba...

item.title: State Dept moves to expand Mexico City Policy, targeting abortion, DEI and gender ideology in foreign aid
item.description: Mexico City Policy expansion will block U.S. foreign aid from supporting gender ideology and DEI programs plus abortion, according to State Department...

item.title: Pro-life organization calls on HHS and FDA to suspend abortion pill approval, tighten safety rules
item.description: Live Action alleges "reckless distribution" of the abortion drug mifepristone, urging the Trump administration to suspend its approval immediately.

item.title: Minnesota agitators arrested in wake of church invasion, Bondi says
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi announced the arrest of two Minnesota agitators who helped organize the storming of Cities Church in St. Paul on Thursday.
